author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Recreate Beyonce’s Grammys Look With Drugstore Makeup - How to DIY Beyonce’s 2017 Grammys Makeup
text:
ICYMI, which, how could you have, Beyoncé looked like a damn angel, glowing during her performance at the 59th Grammy Awards this weekend. Curious as to how she got so #lit? Makeup artist Sir John breaks down her look. Bonus: You can basically get everything at the drugstore, so your skin's about to be as bright and shiny as B's.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below A photo posted by S I R J O H N (@sirjohnofficial) on Feb 13, 2017 at 5:35am PST
1. Prep your skin. Before applying any makeup to Bey's face, Sir John massages in a moisturizer to prime her skin. Try Garnier SkinActive Moisture Bomb The Antioxidant Super Moisturizer .
